110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Thanks for the update and look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Steve
From: Randall Thacker [mailto:randst27@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, August 30, 2011 10:01 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners
Hi Steve,
Thanks for reaching out to me and for you message. I have not yet left my current job, but am still in the process of working towards that. I will definitely reach out to you when I have a contract ready to put in place.
Thanks,
Randall
From: Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> To: "randst27@yahoo.com" <randst27@yahoo.com> Sent: Tuesday, August 30, 2011 2:06 PM Subject: MBO Partners Randall,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners and how that would work on your next consulting contract. I wanted to touch base and find out how that was going.
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before:
This interactive tool shows the value of using a company like MBO as an alternative to incorporation: http://www.mbopartners.com/#whoweareYou can browse through the group benefits you would have access to here: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract:http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index
As I mentioned once you find your next contract we can do a financial illustration showing what that income would look like being run through MBO Partners. Best of luck finding your next contract and Ill follow up with you again as promised.
If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you on my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steve
___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
